name: Magiduel
description:
Magiduel

Hone your skills to battle your friends toe-to-toe in this PvP bullet hell battle game. Across time and space Magic Girls have come together for the ultimate tournament of kawaii. Each with their own strange forms of magic, unlock them all and explore novel styles of gameplay.

  • 6 unlockable fighters, each with a unique battle style
  • Player vs NPC and PvP modes available
  • Multiple control schemes (for 2-player on one keyboard or game pads)
  • Access to your gameplay stats
Controls

Default Controls:

  • z - select/shoot
  • x - cancel
  • up/down/left/right - move

Controls for player 2 and alternate layouts can be set in "Options > Controls" from the main menu.

In Development

Magiduel is still in development, and there are lots of great features planned ahead. The next two in the queue are Android support (sold separately) and Story Mode. Story Mode will explore the characters backgrounds, origin stories, and how they got the the Magic Girl tournament. Your purchase of the game supports its continued development.
